definitions.text: a string of words satisfying the grammatical rules of a language
examples: he always spoke in grammatical sentences

definitions.text: (criminal law) a final judgment of guilty in a criminal case and the punishment that is imposed
examples: the conviction came as no surprise

definitions.text: the period of time a prisoner is imprisoned
examples: he served a prison term of 15 months
he is doing time in the county jail

definitions.text: pronounce a sentence on (somebody) in a court of law
examples: He was condemned to ten years in prison
